# NLP Koans - Python NLP Tutorial Project

This is a Python tutorial project for learning Natural Language Processing (NLP) using Test-Driven Development (TDD) with a Koan-style approach.

## Project Structure
- 9 progressive NLP koans covering essential topics
- Uses pytest for testing
- Includes spaCy, NLTK, transformers, scikit-learn
- Spanish and English examples

## Development Guidelines
- Each koan has tests that fail initially
- Students fix the code to make tests pass
- Progressive difficulty from basic to advanced NLP concepts
